title: Social Network-Based Learning Performance Improvement Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic organizational management experience and leadership competencies
context.additional_context: A course for science sector managers/leaders implementing a balanced learning environment combining group collaboration and individual reflection in smartphone-based limited-technology settings

learning_goals: Learners can utilize a learning efficiency diagnostic tool to analyze the social network structure (density, inter-/intra-group interactions) within an organization within six months
Learners can improve knowledge-sharing quality by over 30% by applying the Content Richness (CR) metric based on strong tie strength within teams
Learners establish collaborative strategies that reduce decision-making time by 20% during problem-solving through network efficiency (information transmission path optimization) analysis

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
